title: Behind The Clouds
alternative_title: Taizi ; Crown Prince ; Detrás de las nubes ; Il Primo Amore del Principe ; The Crown Prince ; Thái Tử ; 太子 ; 太子耽美 ; 구름이 드리우면 ; 태자
status: Taizi ; Crown Prince ; Detrás de las nubes ; Il Primo Amore del Principe ; The Crown Prince ; Thái Tử ; 太子 ; 太子耽美 ; 구름이 드리우면 ; 태자
description:
Description :
        Once revered as a prince, he is now reduced to such a predicament... The saying "The royal family, a family of cold-hearted killers" is like a quote from a nightmare, hanging over the palace chambers till now.
